ygData.subject: Re: Shamans and Clerics
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I *love* being a shaman! But it s made me so *spoiled!* I don t think I could play a class without SOW anymore! I love being able to heal my group, yet get
ygData.messageBody:
On Sat, 26 Jun 1999 19:40:14 terrence wallingford wrote:
>From: terrence wallingford <greenloafers@...>
>
>I would just like to tell everyone out there who is a Cleric that they
>just might like to try out a shaman. I spent 18 levels being a Cleric

I *love* being a shaman! But it's made me so *spoiled!* I don't think I could play a class without SOW anymore! I love being able to heal my group, yet get in there and fight it out by their side. I enjoy buffing my friends and debuffing the bad guys, and then there's always panic-burn. A Shaman can do *anything!*

Though I've been grouping with these two *wonderful* little wood elves lately and they make me feel uncomfortably tall....

>and 5 being a Shaman so far. I was always frustrated with my
>limitations as a Cleric and took on way too much responsibility for
>other people's lives, which made grouping a very un-fun experience. I
>love being a Shaman so far. ( I've made 2 new characters in Quellios.
>Bloodless and Blacksatin) Go ahead and laugh at the names, it's the
>best I can do on such short notice! I agonized believe me. Someone even
>called me "campy"!- whatever that means. I'm only 25, that term's
>before my time.

I don't know if there's a definition of campy, but, as a friend of mine put it "I know camp when I see it." So some good examples of campy are Xena: Warrior Princess and The Mummy.

>I have noticed that a lot of us have said that we play clerics, it
>seems more than any other class. (Or maybe I only notice the clerics
>because I play one.)I hope this doesn't offend you all, but I wonder if
>we have chosen to play one because we are by nature nurturing and
>helpfull, or because we have been raised in our society to act servile

I don't think being a healer is servile.. on the contrary, I feel a small surge of power when I keep someone from dying! I think "If it wasn't for me, that person would have a long run for his corpse."


Pix/Shalka/Megan
